excerpt: PD-1070 is an easy to use PANdrive™ smart stepper motor. The unit is controlled via a step and direction interface. One configuration pin selects the current control mode between StealthChop™ for absolute silent motor control and SpreadCycle™ for high speed. A TTL UART interface allows for more advanced configuration and permanent parameter storage via TMCL™-IDE.All you need to get started is a power supply and Trinamic's free and easy to use TMCL-IDE. This graphical user interface allows quick setup and supports the use of commands in direct mode, monitors real-time behavior visualized in graphs, and logs and stores data.More about the TMCL-IDESpecial FeaturesMicroPlyer™microstep tableCoolStep™SpreadCycle™StallGuard2™StealthChop™
